item.title: My server panel
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This is my void for my server panel… it works… but it keeps being called and called…so i took out everywhere it was being caled…where can i place it that it will be called ONCE>… i used reapage V2 to start with…

    public void panel() {
        showInterface(15892);
	int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
	setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
	sendQuest("Owner: Kenshin", 15895);
	sendQuest("Co-Owner: Chris", 15897);
	sendQuest("Players Online: @gre@"+players, 15898);
	sendQuest("Made by: Kenshin", 15899);
	//sendQuest("Wild status:", 15900); // Used for Safe zones!
	sendQuest("", 15901);
    }

Read full topic
